message: Meet in the middle, no need to negotiate, let's split it 50/50!
I'll give you a good deal, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the offer. You can't do better than this, so take it or leave it!
A fairer split, considering you got a better deal last round. Meet me in the middle again!
You're getting desperate, aren't you? I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy. This is my final offer!
You're getting closer, but I still think you can do better. Don't make me wait!
You're really starting to get desperate, aren't you? I'm not going to give you the whole thing, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. This is my best offer, so take it or leave it!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Time to make a serious offer!
I'm not going to give you the whole thing, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. This is my final offer, so don't waste my time!
